Text: "The SQL statement referenced a class/table whose code type was not found on the client. Missing type: "{0}". Please add the assembly defining this type using Db.Current.EnableClientAssembly(Assembly), for example using Db.Current.EnableClientAssembly(typeof({0}).Assembly).{1}SQL: "{2}"."
